info.name: CDR Register API Conformance Tests v.1.15.0

item.name: Get Data Recipient Software Statement Assertion (SSA)

header.description: (Required) An Authorisation Token as per [RFC6750](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6750).
The version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer.

request.description: Get a Software Statement Assertion (SSA) for a Data Recipient software product on the CDR Register to be used for Dynamic Client Registration with a Data Holder Brand.

header.description: (Required) An Authorisation Token as per [RFC6750](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6750).
The version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer.

variable.description: (Required) Unique id for the Accredited Data Recipient Brand that the Software Product is associated with in the CDR Register
(Required) Unique id for the Accredited Data Recipient Software Product in the CDR Register

header.description: The version of the API end point that the CDR Register has responded with.

response.name: Invalid industry path parameter</br>Invalid SoftwareProductId

header.description: (Required) An Authorisation Token as per [RFC6750](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6750).

variable.description: (Required) The industry the participant is retrieving data for (Banking, etc)
